author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLASH FLOODING CONCERNS FROM CHANTAL SHOULD INCREASE OVERNIGHT...
summary: ...FLASH FLOODING CONCERNS FROM CHANTAL SHOULD INCREASE OVERNIGHT... As of 11:00 PM EDT Sat Jul 05 the center of Chantal was located near 32.7, -78.8 with movement N at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FLASH FLOODING CONCERNS FROM CHANTAL SHOULD INCREASE OVERNIGHT... As of 11:00 PM EDT Sat Jul 05 the center of Chantal was located near 32.7, -78.8 with movement N at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Chantal (AT3/AL032025)
